A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Ok movie terrible Star Wars movie. It should be call Star Wars: let the old things die. They want us to forget how the force actually works\, what made the original trilogy awesome\, and not care about all the build up and questions the force awakens was leading to in the movie. If you was ready for the force awaken sequel this really isn’t it. Storyline doesn’t work and all important characters were botched. Other that a couple cool scenes fans of the o.g. Movies and the force awakens will be disappointed. This director did not get Star Wars had no intention of making a true sequel to JJ Abrams directed force awakens and he messed things up so bad I don’t know how JJ will fix this the next movie. There should have been on director for all of it. This is a shame to have as part movie cannon.
